content: **crocheted top in drops safran the piece is worked top down with fan pattern sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern e-368 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops safran from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 150-150-150-150-200-200 g colour 72 chalk **buttons** drops buttons no 521 2 items in all sizes **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 3 mm **crochet gauge** 24 treble crochets in width and 13 row in height = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
